info.ephyra.answerselection.filters
Class WikipediaTermImportanceFilter

java.lang.Object
  info.ephyra.answerselection.filters.Filter
      info.ephyra.answerselection.filters.WebTermImportanceFilter
          info.ephyra.answerselection.filters.WikipediaTermImportanceFilter

public class WikipediaTermImportanceFilter
extends WebTermImportanceFilter

A web term importance filter that counts term frequencies in a Wikipedia article on the target of the question.

This class extends the class WebTermImportanceFilter.

Version:
2008-02-15
Author:
Guido Sautter
